1. Optimize Your Profile

Create a brand-ready presence.

  • Clear Bio: Highlight niche (e.g., ‘Fitness Creator’).
  • Professional Visuals: Use high-quality images.
  • Highlight Metrics: Share 5%+ engagement in link-in-bio.

2. Create High-Quality Content

Attract brands with polished posts.

  • Use Reels: 15–30-second videos with trending audio.
  • Post Consistently: 3–5 posts weekly.
  • Maintain Aesthetic: Use cohesive filters.

3. Build a Media Kit

Showcase your value.

5. Pitch Strategically

Stand out with tailored pitches.

  • Highlight Fit: Share audience alignment.

6. Track and Report Performance

Prove your impact.

Secure recurring deals.
